title: Can't play D:
body:
Hello guys!

I got issues with my lol Client could anyone help me? When I open lol launcher It's opening the old launcher and when i click ''PLAY'' an error message appear saying:  error (0xc0000005) .
Thx for the help :)

replies.body:
First, let's make sure your client is able to locate and load the updated client correctly.

- Navigate to your League of Legends installation folder. (Typically C:\Riot Games\League of Legends)
- Scroll down until you find "LeagueClient.exe" and delete the file.
- Open the client by using "lol.launcher.admin.exe"
- Repair the client by selecting the “?” button in the top right-hand corner of the Patcher window (the first window that appears) and under the options menu, select Repair.

This will force the patch to fix up any bad game files as well as repair any issues loading the updated client.  If the issue persists then there could be a security setting blocking the client from loading.  Let me know if the issue persists, and we can go from there.
